This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gross sales in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2015.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2017.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2016.
